post.body: Very cute.
Oh he got his payback and kibble. Check this out. http://tinyurl.com/6crpgl
congratulations!
Hey there. I'm good. Just the usual holiday rushing about. Crazy weather here. How are you?
Great hat. Especially for this chilly weather.
Thank you.
We are having our first snow storm. Never a dull minute. How are you?
Hi Sue. I'm good. I'm getting called into the pharmacy. Computers systems are down and they are on manual backup. Fun fun
There is an shop glasstastictreasures that has Twilight pendants. Hope this helps you.
I'm not sure. It just started in Portland. We have a light dusting so far.
Happy Birthday! Have a great day.
Thank you. You have a great shop. My friend in CA. is totally into the Twilight books now.
Thank you Tabihats. Thanks for the heart. Have a great weekend.
Thank you. I love dichro too.
Wow. That's crazy.
Great song. Love her voice.
LOL. : ) Thanks. Hopefully it will stick around for Christmas.
It's still snowing in Portland too. Your blog is very funny and sooo true. I have been inside since yesterday.
LOL. That's funny.
Yup, dogs. Two blue Great Danes. I also have a fish tank (16 fish, 3 frogs, and one crazy eel named ziggy)
At least it's pretty. lol I have a ham in the oven and I stocked up on dog food for the pups. We are going to be just fine.
Beautiful treasury. Congratulations.
I agree. It's snowing again now. Mother nature has the weather forecasters in a tizzy. lol I won't worry until tomorrow.
LOL. I'm sure I could make it to the post office. Right now, I would need ice skates.
I like the snow. The ice and freezing rain I can do without. It was so pretty yesterday. Snowed all day.
Me too. We didn't get that much snow here in PDX. The freezing rain is starting again. So glad I don't have to go to work.
LOL. You do that too. eh?
Anyone need a laugh? Check this out. http://tinyurl.com/638g8u
I'm off to cut some glass before work. Trying to make a horseshoe pendant for secret santa. Have a great day everyone.
Renewed. Purple and Blue Mr. Turtle glass pendant. http://tinyurl.com/5lap9p Good Morning all.
BBBrrrrr. Babe it's COLD outside. I think I'm going to make some peppermint tea.
Brand New fused glass pendant. Twinkle, Twinkle http://tinyurl.com/5cqn85
It's snowing in Portland, Oregon. Woo Hoo
Good morning. No new snow. Yeah. My back is still recovering from yesterday. lol
Cabin Fever Sale. I put a bunch of pendants on sale. Here's one http://tinyurl.com/5s48es
Wow. Just got in from shoveling snow. Every 5 years I say that I'm going to buy a real snow shovel. lol
Okay, I'm a little stir crazy. I just put a bunch of pendants on sale. Here's one http://tinyurl.com/6bslct
It's time to go cut some glass and listen to the new Anastacia CD "Heavy Rotation". Love it.
Good morning. Portland is a winter wonderland. They are telling people not to drive. Sounds like a great day to stay home.
Another cahooting necklace. Red Zebra Striped necklace. http://tinyurl.com/7xdwrh
